title: CravePizza
description: I collaborated closely with a cross-functional team to create a dynamic and user-friendly e-commerce platform. The website featured a comprehensive product catalog, intuitive search and filtering functionalities, and a secure payment system, ensuring a seamless and secure shopping experience for customers.My role involved developing the front-end interface using modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I implemented responsive design principles, enabling the website to adapt seamlessly to different devices and screen sizes. Additionally, I integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways to facilitate secure and convenient transactions.
